content: ह्रस्व {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [ह्रस्-वन्] (<ab>compar.</ab> ह्रसीयस्, <ab>superl.</ab> ह्रसिष्ठ) {@--1@} Short, small, little. {@--2@} Dwarfish, low or short in stature. {@--3@} Short (<ab>opp.</ab> to दीर्घ in prosody). --स्वः {@--1@} A dwarf. {@--2@} A short vowel. --स्वं Green or black sulphate of iron.
